metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11695 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in LibSass <3.5.3. A NULL pointer dereference wasfound in the function Sass::Expand::operator which could be leveraged by anattacker to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
